stocks.ai_explanation: Exxon Mobil Corporation (XOM) is a major American multinational corporation involved in the exploration, production, refining, marketing, and distribution of petroleum products. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.

Chevron Corporation (CVX) is an American multinational oil company engaged in the exploration, development, production, transportation, and marketing of crude oil and natural gas. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
Nexen Inc. (NEE) is a Canadian oil and gas producer based in Calgary, Alberta, Canada. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
Shell plc (SHEL) is a British multinational oil and gas company headquartered in London, England. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
British Petroleum (BP) is a multinational oil and gas company headquartered in London, England. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
